DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate efficacy verum acupuncture ( VA ) prevention migraine without aura compare non-penetrating sham acupuncture ( SA ) usual care alone ( UC ) . This study also aim determine whether intensity deqi sensation psychosocial factor ( include patient expectation , patient personality trait , patient-doctor relationship , traditional Chinese medicine constitution , depression , anxiety , sleep quality , etc . ) associate clinical outcome .
DOC.brief_title: Efficacy Study Acupuncture Prevention Migraine Without Aura
DOC.detailed_description: The trail consist three period : baseline period treatment randomization ( week-4 week 0 ) , treatment period ( week 1 week 8 ) , follow-up period ( week 9 week 20 ) .A total 150 participant randomly assign verum acupuncture ( VA ) group , sham acupuncture ( SA ) group , usual care ( UC ) group ratio 2:2:1 . The primary outcome measure change migraine day migraine attack cycle 4 week compare baseline . The secondary outcome measure proportion responder , headache intensity , intake acute medication , change life quality sleep quality . Deqi sensation measure Chinese version Massachusetts General Hospital Acupuncture Sensation Scale . Psychological outcome measure Beck Depression Rating Scale , Beck Anxiety Inventory , NEO Five-Factor Inventory , Doctor-Patient Relationship Scale , Difficult Doctor-Patients Relationship Scale . Participants ask complete headache diary baseline follow-up period . The central randomization data collection conduct electronic data management system .
DOC.criteria: 1 . Diagnosed migraine without aura accord International Classification Headache Disorders,3rd edition beta version ( ICHD3Î² ) ; 2 . Aged 15 65 year old , initial onset migraine age 50 year ; 3 . Experienced migraine attack least 1 year ; 4 . Experienced migraine attack 28 time per month last 3 month baseline period , duration migraine attack last 472h without intake acute drug least 2h intake acute drug ; 5. mean headache Visual Analogue Scale ( VAS ) score 48 baseline ; 6 . Had take acupuncture treatment study entry ; 7 . Able complete baseline headache diary ; 8 . Able signing inform consent . 1 . Tensiontype headache , cluster headache , primary headache disorder , secondary headache disorder , neuralgia face head ; 2 . Combined cardiovascular , liver , kidney , gastrointestinal tract , blood system serious primary disease affect implementation treatment program , combine epilepsy , Parkinson nervous system diseases ; 3 . Patients severe mental illness , severe anxiety depression ; 4 . Pregnant woman , woman lactation , plan become pregnant ; 5 . Participation clinical trial ; 6 . Illiterate , patient unable read understand scale ; 7 . Have experience acupuncture .
